title: Kate Berlant • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #70
itunes:title: Kate Berlant • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #70
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly great comedian and actor KATE BERLANT!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly awesome comedian, improv and otherwise, and actor KATE BERLANT!


A lovely conversation with Brett and Kate, in a relatively dingey backstage area somewhere in deepest London with several background noise challenges that should hopefully dissolve from your mind pretty swiftly! Kicking things off with some proper comedy chat and gossip about Kate’s background and new show at the Soho Theatre, they get down to the actual business of death and cinema which is what we’ve all been waiting for! A deep one, and a very funny one, with all angles covered including acting and improvisation worlds, evolving improv bits into stage bits, some ace parent talk involving her performance artist mum, dislike of animation and like of real life, and a first where Kate actually adds a new question to the proceedings! How about that. Ladies and gentlemen, Kate Berlant!


EPISODE LINKS:

• KATE on TWITTER!

• KATE on THE INTERNET!

• HOW TO WASH A DISH video!

• SORRY TO BOTHER YOU!

• ONCE UPON A TIME IN HOLLYWOOD!

• PAST SHOW AT SOHO THEATRE!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT on PATREON!

• FTBBW PODCAST MERCHANDISE!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
